Android announced new sideloading rules requiring developer verification, rolling out globally by 2027. Linus and Luke discuss what this means for app freedom, comparisons to Apple’s model, and whether alternatives like GrapheneOS are the way forward.

Watch the full WAN Show: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=DzvhAMHF_dY

title: Google is Removing Sideloading

Linus and Luke have a candid discussion about the recent downturn in LTT’s video performance. Is it YouTube algorithm quirks or audience changes and brand perception? LLD explore possible reasons why views have fallen and what it could mean for the future of the channel.

Watch the full WAN Show: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=DzvhAMHF_dY

title: Our Views Are Down.
